info.title: Onezone
info.description:
This is the RESTful API definition of Onezone component of Onedata data management system [http://www.onedata.org].

This API allows control and configuration of local Onezone service deployment, in particular management
of users, spaces, groups and providers.

## Authentication
In order to be able to use this API the REST client must be able to authenticate with the Onezone service.

Currently this is supported through access token which can be generate using the Onedata user interface. 
The token must be added to the request header:
 ```
 macaroon: IAUYCGOUASGDJHASDJKVAHSDJHASDKJHABSDKJHBASKJHDBKJHASBDKJHBASDKJHBASD...
 ```

In addition please take into account, that depending on your account authorization rights, not all operations
may be possible. In particular, some operations depend on whether a particular request is initiated by a regular
user or by another storage provider within a zone.

In case of Oneprovider API calls, the provider identification and authorization are based on
the SSL Peer Certificate that has been signed by this Onezone service during registration.

## Effective users and effective groups
Onedata supports creation of arbitrary nested group tree structures. In order to allow identification
if a given user belongs to the group directly or indirectly by belonging to a subgroup of a group,
separate API calls are provided for getting information about group users (direct group members) and 
effective users (indirect group members).

## API structure
Most operations are RESTful, i.e. paths reflect the actual resource mode and operations on them are mapped to
most appropriate HTTP methods.


### Space management
The space management operations of this API provide means for accessing information about spaces 
and their management.

### Group management
The group management operations allow for creation of user groups, assigning their authorization rights,
adding and removing users from groups.

### User management
The user management methods enable for creation of users, managing their authorization
credentials as well as space and group membership.

### Provider management
Provider specific calls enable for getting global information about the spaces managed by the provider,
and some administrative operations which can be used for monitoring or accounting.

### Privileges management
Onezone allows any user to have selected administration privileges for the Onezone service itself,
enabling them to view and configure certain aspects of the system.

get.description: Returns the list of all spaces managed by the Onezone service. Requires 'list_spaces' Onezone privilege.

200.description: List of spaces Id's.

post.description:
When called by a regular user, creates a new space and creates the current user its owner.

When called by a provider, creates a new spaces and automatically adds support for, based on the token provided in the request body.

201.description: ID of the created space in the form /spaces/{id} is  returned in the response `location` header.

get.description: Returns the details about a specific space. If called by user who is not member of the space, requires 'list_spaces' privilege.

200.description: Information about a space.

patch.description: Updates the details about a space.

200.description: The space has been removed successfully.

get.description: Returns the list of users belonging to a specific space.

200.description: The list of all user ID's that belong to a specific space

get.description: Creates a token allowing new user to join a space.

200.description: The token for joining a specific group.

get.description: Returns the public information about a specific user in a space.

200.description: Information about a space user.
The group privileges have been set successfully.

get.description: Returns privileges of a user belonging to the space.

200.description: The list of user privileges in a space.

put.description: Adds specific privileges for a user in a space.

200.description: The user privileges have been added.

get.description: Returns the list of groups belonging to a specific space.

200.description: The list of all group ID's that belong to a specific space

get.summary: Create space invite token for group
get.description: Creates a token allowing to add a group to a specific space.

200.description: The token for joining a specific group.

get.description: Returns details about a specific group in a space.

200.description: Details of a specific group in a space.
A space has been removed from group.

get.description: Returns privileges for a group to a specific space.

200.description: The list of group privileges in a space.

put.description: Sets new privileges for a group to a specific space.

200.description: The group privileges have been added.

get.description: Returns the list of providers supporting specific space. This method is allowed for effective space members or users with 'list_providers_of_space' privilege.

200.description: The list of all provider ID's that support a specific space.

get.description: Creates a token which can be submitted to a selected provider in order to  add storage support for the space.

200.description: The token for getting space storage support from a provider.

get.description: Returns details about a specific provider supporting the space.

200.description: Details about a specific provider supporting a space.

delete.description: Removes support from provider for a specific space.

200.description: A space is no longer supported by this provider.

get.description: Returns details about currently authenticated user.

200.description: Returns the information about user.

patch.description: Modifies user account details based on information provided in the request body.

delete.description: Removes the account of currently authenticated user.

200.description: User removed successfully.

post.description: Authorizes user with authentication token through Onezone web interface. This interface is called only by providers.

200.description: User authorized successfully - the body contains a discharge macaroon.

get.description: Returns the list of users' spaces.

200.description: Returns the list of user spaces, including information which space is default.

spaces.description: The list of all user spaces ID's.

default.description: The ID of the default user space.

post.description: Creates a new space as current user. The user automaticaly becomes  the spaces' member.

201.description: ID of the created space in the form /user/spaces/{id} is  returned in the response `location` header.

get.description: Returns the ID of the default users space.

200.description: Returns the Id of the default user space or 'undefined' in case no space is selected as default.

put.description: Sets default space for current user.

200.description: Space created successfully.

post.description: Join existing space using inivitation token.

201.description: ID of the joined space in the form /user/spaces/{id} is  returned in the response `location` header.

get.description: Creates an invitation token which allows other users to join the space.

200.description: The space invitation token.

get.description: Returns the details of a specific space.

200.description: Returns the details of a specific space.

delete.description: Removes the users ownership or membership in a specific space.

200.description: The space was deleted successfuly.

get.description: Returns the list of user's groups.

200.description: The list of groups.

post.description: Creates a new group for the current user.  The user automatically becomes a member of this group.

201.description: ID of the created group in the form /user/groups/{gid} is  returned in the response `location` header.

post.description: Join existing group using inivitation token.

201.description: ID of the joined group in the form /user/groups/{id} is  returned in the response `location` header.

get.description: Returns information about a specific group to which the user belongs.

200.description: Returns the information about a specific group.

delete.description: Removes the current user from a specific group.

200.description: The user left the group successfully.

get.description: Creates a user authorization token that can be used in `oneclient` command line or via REST API.

200.description: The token for joining a specific group.

201.description: ID of the group created in the form /groups/{id} is  returned in the response `location` header.

get.description: Returns the information about a specific group.

200.description: Information about a group.

patch.description: Updates the details about a group.

get.description: Returns the list of effective group users, which includes both who directly belong to the group, as well as users who belong to the group indirectly through its parent groups.

200.description: The list of effective user ID's that belong to a specific group

get.description: Get group user details
get.summary: Returns public information about a specific group user.

200.description: Returns the information about a group user.

get.description: Returns the user privileges in a group.

200.description: Returns the information about a group user.

get.description: Returns the list of users belonging to a specific group.

200.description: The list of all user ID's that belong to a specific group

get.summary: Create user invite token for group
get.description: Creates a token allowing new user to join the group.

200.description: The token for joining a specific group.

get.description: Returns the public information about a user {uid} in group {id}.

200.description: Information about a group user.

delete.description: Removes the user {uid} from a group {id} (the user will no longer have access  to spaces accessible to the group).

202.description: The user will be removed from the group.

get.description: Returns the list of user privileges in a specific group.

200.description: The list of user privileges in a group.

put.description: Sets privileges for a user {uid} in a group {id}.

200.description: The user privileges have been added.

get.description: Returns the parent groups of a specific group.

200.description: The list of parent group ID's.

get.description: Returns details about a specific parent group.

200.description: Information about a specific parent group.

get.description: Returns the list of subgroups of a specific group.

200.description: The list of subgroup ID's.

get.description: Creates a token that can be used to add a group as subgroup of group with {id}.

200.description: The token for joining a specific group.

post.description: Adds given group as a subgroup of a specific group based on provided token.  The parent group to which the group will be added is identified from the token  (the token is issued in the context of a group).

201.description: ID of the joined group in the form /groups/{id} is  returned in the response `location` header.

get.description: Returns information about a specific nested group.

200.description: Information about a specific nested group.

delete.description: Removes a specific subgroup with {nid} from parent group with {id}.

get.description: Returns the list of nested group privileges in a specific group.

200.description: The list of nested group privileges in a group.

put.description: Sets privileges for a specific subgroup in a group.

200.description: The user privileges have been added.

get.description: Returns the list of spaces to which the group has access.

200.description: The list of space ID's for which the group has access.

post.description: Creates a new space on behalf of a specific group.

201.description: ID of the created space in the form /spaces/{id} is  returned in the response `location` header.

post.description: Joins the group to an existing space based on provided space invitation token.

201.description: ID of the joined space in the form /spaces/{id} is  returned in the response `location` header.

get.summary: Create space creation token for group
get.description: Creates a token that can be given to selected provider,  where it can be used to create a new space for the group and automatically support it.

200.description: The token for joining a specific space.

get.description: Returns information about a specific space to which the group belongs.

200.description: Information about a specific space in a group.

delete.description: Removes the group {id} from space {sid} (the group will no longer have access to space).

202.description: A groupwill be removed from the space.

get.description: Returns information about the Oneprovider that performed the request  (based on provided Peer Certificate authorization).

200.description: Returns the information about Oneprovider.

post.description: Registers a Oneprovider in Onezone service.  Requires a CSR and returns signed certificate that will must used by the Oneprovider  for authorization (SSL Peer Certificate).

200.description: Provider registered successfully.

id.description: The ID of the registered provider

cert.description: The signed certificate to be used when connecting to Onezone services.

delete.description: Unregisters a Oneprovider from the nezone service.

providerId.description: The ID of the provider to unregister.

get.description: Returns the information about a another Oneprovider service, which is  connected to the current provider. If called by other provider doesn't require any special privileges. When called by a regular user, requires 'list_providers' privilege.

200.description: Information about a provider.

get.description: Returns the list of spaces managed by the Oneprovider that performed the request.

200.description: The list of space ID's.

post.description: Creates a new space on behalf of the Oneprovider that performed the request.

201.description: ID of the created space in the form /spaces/{id} is  returned in the response `location` header.

post.description: Adds support for specific space on behalf of the Oneprovider that performed the  request. Space support token is required.

201.description: ID of the supported space in the form /spaces/{id} is  returned in the response `location` header.

get.description: Returns information about a specific space supported by the Oneprovider that  performed the request.

200.description: Returns the information about a specific space.

delete.description: Removes support for space from the Oneprovider that performed the request.

200.description: The space support has ended.

get.description: Returns the IP of the request peer. Will return the external IP (as seen by the Onezone).

200.description: The IP of the requesting peer.

post.description: Checks if all given ports are reachable from Onezone.  Ports is a list on form [URL:port, URL:port, ...],  for example [https://provider1.com:80, https://provider1.com:443]

200.description: Returns the list of ports (with URLs) and their status.

get.description: Returns the list of providers registered in the Onezone service. Requires 'list_providers' Onezone privilege.

200.description: List of providers Id's.

get.description: Returns the list of user privileges for Onezone.

200.description: The list of user privileges in Onezone.

put.description: Sets privileges for a user {id} for Onezone.

200.description: The user privileges have been added.

delete.description: Removes all privileges for a user {id} to Onezone.

200.description: The user privileges have been added.

get.description: Returns the list of group privileges for Onezone.

200.description: The list of group privileges in Onezone.

put.description: Sets privileges for a user {id} for Onezone.

200.description: The group privileges have been added.

delete.description: Removes all privileges for a group {id} to Onezone.

200.description: The group privileges have been added.

Error.description: Generic error model for REST requests.

example.error_description: Provided token could not be validated.

name.description: The user friendly name of storage resource.

connectedAccounts.description: The list of accounts connected to this user.

urls.description: The list of urls where the provider can be reached.

redirectionPoint.description: The redirection URL for the provider.

csr.description: Certificate Signature Request - optional parameter used when registering a new provider.

latitude.description: The geographical latitude of the provider data center location.

longitude.description: The geographical latitude of the provider data center location.

identifier.description: The authentication token for Onezone service.

size.description: The size of requested space support.

token.description: The token for supporting a space.

ClientToken.description: Client token for authorization from command line or via REST.

spaceId.description: The ID of the default user space.

token.description: The token for joining a space.
The token for joining a group.
